      Classes in org.eclipse.paho.client.mqttv3.persist that implement MqttClientPersistence 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MemoryPersistence
      Persistence that uses memory In cases where reliability is not required across client or device restarts memory this memory persistence can be used.
      class  MqttDefaultFilePersistence
      An implementation of the MqttClientPersistence interface that provides file based persistence.
